GAM-NICHE: Shape-Constrained GAMs to build Species Distribution Models under the ecological niche theory About

GAM-NICHE: Shape-Constrained GAMs to build Species Distribution Models under the ecological niche theory AZTI 2023-05-03 About This is a short tutorial for constructing species distribution models in R using shape-constrained generalized additive models, based on the development and application to marine fish by Citores and Chust (2020). The code is available in AZTIâ€™s github repository and the book is readily available here. To cite this book, please use: Valle, M., Citores, L., Ibaibarriaga, L., Chust, C.
